__e: Major Burns isn't saying much of anything, sir.
The major didn't have nothin' to do with that.
Major, I don't know what else you want from me. You wanted the evidence, we gave it to you.
He is the one who will get me because he is the major and he will get me for the entire night, not just an hour or two but the entire night.
You have a job to do here, Major.
I always want to see you. And therein lies the problem.
I think there's something you'd like to say to Major Nelson, isn't there?
Waiting for you to tell me why Major Nelson does not want me around.
Major Nelson tells me that you think he's getting married.
This wouldn't have anything to do with Major Carter, would it?
Major Carter, I think it's time everybody to be told what... you already told me.
I know that Major Carter means a great deal to you.
If you'll listen, Major, you may hear something that will make it quite worthwhile for you.
MAJOR, YOU SHOULDN'T BE OUT OF BED! WHY, IF THE DOCTOR... SOMEBODY'S GOT TO HELP HIM.
I guess it's time to meet Major Kira.
Thank you, but I know their names and I'm not here to make friends.
Yes. It's the one-month anniversary of your first date with Major Kira.
